T.query: select pod.purchaseorderid,pod.purchaseorderdetailid from product p join purchaseorderdetail pod on p.productid = pod.productid join purchaseorderheader poh on pod.purchaseorderid = poh.purchaseorderid where p.safetystocklevel =1000 or p.listprice>150 or poh.shipmethodid=1 or poh.orderdate='2011-04-30 00:00:00' or poh.shipdate= '2011-04-25 00:00:00' or poh.subtotal > 25000 or pod.orderqty=4 or pod.unitprice>50;

select pod.purchaseorderid,pod.purchaseorderdetailid from product p join purchaseorderdetail pod on p.productid = pod.productid join purchaseorderheader poh on pod.purchaseorderid = poh.purchaseorderid where p.safetystocklevel =1000 or p.listprice>150 or poh.shipmethodid=1 or poh.orderdate='2011-04-30 00:00:00' or poh.shipdate= '2012-04-25 00:00:00' or poh.subtotal > 35000 or pod.orderqty=1 or pod.unitprice>500;

select pod.purchaseorderid,pod.purchaseorderdetailid from product p join purchaseorderdetail pod on p.productid = pod.productid join purchaseorderheader poh on pod.purchaseorderid = poh.purchaseorderid where p.safetystocklevel =1000 or p.listprice>150 or poh.shipmethodid=1 or poh.orderdate='2011-04-30 00:00:00' or poh.shipdate= '2011-04-25 00:00:00' or poh.subtotal > 25000 or pod.orderqty=4 or ( pod.unitprice>50 and pod.duedate>'2012-01-01');
